cast.name: 马里鲁·马里尼 Marilu Marini
汤姆·诺姆贝尔 Tom Novembre

introduction: Renart, artist in a nightclub, is on conflict with his boss, so he leaves with his girlfriend to a country house. He meets ancient friends and rents a disused factory to present shows. But his pastfife comes again. His boss wants to charge him for his insulte and gets a killer to go in search of him, but this one stays with Renart.So, everything breaks down. After a disastrous show, his friends forsake him and he is beaten up by the hatchet men of his ancient boss.He's a lonely man, exiled from the world he created, a victim of his own will to be like those he fled.Michel Soutter is a Swiss director, born in 1932, died in 1991. With Alain Tanner and Claude Goretta, he was part of the major trio of the “New Swiss Cinema” of the 60's and 70's.
